text: Motion
Motion
Butoh Instructor

(Is today's lesson over already...
Should I inform Mikoto about tomorrow's schedule...?)
Are we going to start with the music now?
Yes, that's right.

(────Oops, maybe I should hold off for now...
Looks like they're talking to the dance instructor.)

I'm not sure if I should put a band on it.
I'm still thinking about it....

If we're aiming to captivate the audience through dance,
we might not need it, so I'm a bit torn...

I think it's worth trying out different options.
...Well then, sorry, but I'm done here.

Yes.
Thank you for your hard work.

Oh, and thank you to 283PRO-san too.
Excuse me.

Yes...! Thank you for your hard work.
Looking forward to working with you next time...!
Hey, Mikoto.
Hm?
Have you known the dance instructor for a long time?

Yeah. We have a bit of a connection,
and that's why they're instructing us again this time.
I see...

I want to make sure we have an amazing stage,
no matter what.

Yeah, that's right...
I'll make sure to support you properly.
Yeah, thank you.
